cause.description:
"The Palmer Drug Abuse Program (PDAP) was founded in 1971 in Houston, Texas. We have been providing free substance abuse recovery services to teenagers and young adults for more than 35 years. We provide 12-step support group meetings, crisis intervention & referral, individual and family counseling sessions, and drug-free social and recreational activities for young people between the ages 12-25. We also provide recovery group meetings and other services for the parents of these young people."
(http://www.pdaphouston.org/HOUPDAP.html). PDAP Houston. 16 June 2007.
Please visit www.pdaphouston.org for more information about this important cause. You can also make a donation directly on the PDAP Houston website.
1. administered with the highest level of integrity
2. free to all participants
3. spiritually-based on the twelve steps
4. provides social activities in a safe and supportive environment
cause.mission: "To help young people and families recover from the devastating effects of drug and alcohol abuse."
